set(GLEW_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE INTERNAL "GLEW directory")
set(GLEW_INCLUDE ${GLEW_DIR}/include CACHE INTERNAL "GLEW includes")
set(GLEW_LIB ${GLEW_DIR}/lib/${TARGET_PLATFORM}/glew32.lib CACHE INTERNAL "GLEW library")
set(GLEW_DLL ${GLEW_DIR}/lib/${TARGET_PLATFORM}/glew32.dll CACHE INTERNAL "GLEW dll")

# Copy SDL DLL to target directory
file(COPY ${GLEW_DLL} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Install GLEW dll
install(FILES ${GLEW_DLL} DESTINATION ${INSTALL_BIN} COMPONENT runtime)
